mapper.select: SELECT POST_COMMENT_ID, P.USER_ID USER_ID, M.P_IMG USER_P_IMG, POST_ID, POST_COMMENT, TO_CHAR(COMMENT_TIME, 'RR/MM/DD HH24:MI') "COMMENT_TIME", P.STATUS STATUS FROM POST_COMMENT P, MEMBER M WHERE P.USER_ID = M.USER_ID AND POST_ID = #{postId} AND P.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY POST_COMMENT_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST_COMMENT VALUES (SEQ_POST_COMMENT_NO.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{postId}, #{postComment}, SYSDATE, DEFAULT)
